snippet: Reviews of Philippe Entremont with the Manhattan School of Music Symphony Orchestra; the pianist Simone Dinnerstein; and the composer Ezequiel Viñao.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of Mozart works performed by the Manhattan School of Music Symphony, conducted by visiting pianist Philippe Entremont and performance of Bach pieces by pianist Simone Dinnerstein at the Miller Theater; Steve Smith reviews concert of five-song cycle performed and composed by Ezequiel Vinao.

byline.original: By VIVIEN SCHWEITZER and STEVE SMITH

lead_paragraph: Reviews of Philippe Entremont with the Manhattan School of Music Symphony Orchestra; the pianist Simone Dinnerstein; and the composer Ezequiel Viñao.

headline.seo: Philippe Entremont Conducts; Simone Dinnerstein Performs; Music by Ezequiel Viñao
